original_title: Takuya Kimura Go with the Flow Live Tour
overview: The first solo live performance of Takuya Kimura, held on February 8, 2020 (Saturday) has finally been made into a concert film!  The film includes not only the live performance but also MC and Junction footage, so that those who were not able to attend the live can feel the atmosphere of the concert.
title: Go with the Flow: Live Tour
